\section{Motivating Example}

\begin{figure}[h]
  \centering
  \includegraphics[width=1.1\linewidth]{rational_root_tree.png}
  \caption{The steps of circ\_roots\_rational\_form(p,q,l) in Alg.\ref{alg:circ_roots_rational_form}.}
  \Description{}
\end{figure}


\section{Algorithm Design}


\begin{algorithm}
   \caption{circ\_roots\_rational\_form(p,q,l)}
   \label{alg:circ_roots_rational_form}
\begin{algorithmic}
  \STATE r, s  = circ\_sq\_root(p,q)
	\STATE t, u  = circ\_neg(r,s)
	  \IF{l == 1}
		  \RETURN [(r,s),(t,u)]
	\ELSIF {l != 0}
		\STATE left  = circ\_roots\_rational\_form(r,s,l-1)
		\STATE right = circ\_roots\_rational\_form(t,u,l-1)
		\RETURN left $\cup$ right
	\ELSE
		\RETURN  [(p,q)]
      \ENDIF
\end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}



\begin{algorithm}
\caption{circ\_sq\_root(p,q)}
\label{alg:circ_sq_root}
\begin{algorithmic}
	\IF{ p\%q == 0}
		\RETURN  1,1
	\ELSE
		\RETURN  p, 2$\cdot$q
  \ENDIF
\end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}


\begin{algorithm}
\caption{circ\_neg(p,q)}
\label{alg:circ_neg}
\begin{algorithmic}
	\IF{ p\%q == 0}
		\RETURN  1,2
	\ELSE
		\RETURN  2$\cdot$p+q, 2$\cdot$q
  \ENDIF
\end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}
